title: Bug 7752: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB
2. Create two projects
3. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., "foo.txt")
4. From the main menu, select File > Export > Zip File
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file using File > Export > Zip File option, the export process fails.
EB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file using File > Export > Zip File option, the export should complete successfully, preserving the directory structure within the zip file and including all files with their respective paths.
SR:
1. Launch WSWB
2. Create two projects
3. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., "foo.txt")
4. From the main menu, select File > Export > Zip File
5. Verify that the export process completes successfully and that the zip file contains all files with their respective directory structure.
